name: Fini
headline: Turn your knowledgebase into AI chat, in 2 minutes
description:
Resolve 70% of customer questions with your new AI teammate - helping you
save costs, and keep your customer happy. Fini securely integrates with your
knowledgebase, and gives you an AI agent, ready 24/7 to solve even the thorniest customer
queries on Zendesk, Slack, Discord and more

founders.name: Deepak Singla, Founder
founders.description: Deepak Singla is the co-founder of Fini. Deepak leads Fini’s product strategy, and the mission to automate customer interactions for tech companies around the world. Originally from India, Deepak graduated from IIT Delhi where he received a Bachelor degree in Mechanical Engineering, and a minor degree in Business Management

founders.name: Hakim K, Founder
founders.description: Hakim is leading tech at Fini. Hakim has a background in software engineering and analytics across 4+ organizations and 10+ years of experience. Most recently at Uber, Hakim met Deepak. Originally from Sweden, Hakim graduated from École Polytechnique with a master's degree in Engineering Mathematics.

generated_description:
**Fini: Transforming Customer Support with AI**

Fini, a startup founded in 2022 and a member of Y Combinator's Batch S22, is on a mission to revolutionize customer service through AI technology. Located in Amsterdam, Netherlands, with a compact team of five, Fini aims to make the process of integrating AI into businesses easy and fast—essentially turning your knowledge base into an AI chat companion in just two minutes.

Initially, Fini focused on addressing customer support challenges by providing an AI teammate capable of resolving 70% of customer queries, which translates to significant cost savings and improved client satisfaction. This AI seamlessly integrates with existing platforms like Zendesk, Slack, and Discord, providing 24/7 support for even the trickiest questions.

**Core Features:**
- **Rapid Integration**: With no coding required, businesses can integrate Fini with various platforms quickly, allowing them to leverage their existing data without starting from scratch.
- **Natural, Conversational Experiences**: Users can customize the AI to fit their brand's tone and personality, creating a more engaging experience for end-users.
- **Data Security**: Fini emphasizes stringent data protection measures, including SOC 2 Type II, ISO 27001 certifications, and GDPR compliance, ensuring that customer data remains secure.

**Key Metrics**: Fini reports significant improvements for its clients, including a 12% increase in retention, a 15% revenue uplift per user, and rapid integration times averaging just seven days.

**Use Cases**: Fini has been successfully adopted across various industries, including e-commerce and fintech. Remarkable results include a 21% increase in paid conversion rates and a 24% improvement in user retention for companies like Lancey.

Fini is not just another AI tool; it promises to make customer service smarter, faster, and more engaging, empowering teams by reducing their workload and enhancing customer satisfaction. For those curious, you can explore more about Fini on their website [here](https://www.usefini.com). 

In a world craving efficiency and personalization, Fini stands out by making complex AI support accessible and effective, driving innovation in the customer service landscape.
